title: Pixel 3A wifi connection speed slow
content:
Wifi connection speed.on phone is much slower then other devices in the house, older nexus 4 windows 10 laptop, desktop computer. Tried rebooting router, forgetting and reconnecting wifi on phone, rebooting phone etc.

Connection speed is 11mb shows constant 10mb on every other device but cell phone can't get above 4mb???? Tested with just phone connected to internet as well

Problem pixel 3a can't get my full connection speed, please help.
